title: Manly Beachside Studio Retreat 30-Minute Ferry Ride from Sydney’s Circular Quay
description:
Contemporary coastal-chic accommodation meets an incredible location at this beachside haven, superbly positioned just steps from one of Australia’s most iconic stretches of coastline.

The Sebel Sydney Manly Beach makes your next beachside holiday a breeze with its coveted location and exceptional facilities, including two onsite pools. Outside the hotel, foodies will be thrilled with the endless options nearby - share plates at Little Pearl, classic Cantonese at Queen Chow Manly and fresh seafood at The Herring Room.
offer_address: 8-13 South Steyne, Manly, New South Wales 2095, Australia
